data.name: Santa Monica Paradise R18 Patch

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Vista or higher
  • Processor: 1.5Ghz Processor or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This DLC contains Nudity and Sexual Content which is not suitable for all audiences.
